plot: Comedy - No time for separation blues! The recently divorced Mia, mother of a pubescent son, is pushed into an online dating service blind date organized by her best friend. But what exactly does "open-minded*" really mean?
title: Offen für Neues*
plot_es: Comedy - No time for separation blues! The recently divorced Mia, mother of a pubescent son, is pushed into an online dating service blind date organized by her best friend. But what exactly does "open-minded*" really mean?
plot_en: Comedy - No time for separation blues! The recently divorced Mia, mother of a pubescent son, is pushed into an online dating service blind date organized by her best friend. But what exactly does "open-minded*" really mean?
